amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning the American Red Cross and Critical Biomedical Systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3643 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3643 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S9208-9209; text: CR S9209) To express the sense of the Senate concerning the American Red Cross and Critical Biomedical Systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3643 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3643 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Roberts.
